author: desruisseaux
msg: Initial port of GeneralMatrix, for all cases not covered by Matrix1,2,3,4.
The 'inverse()' method will uses JAMA. We do not expose JAMA directly because inspection of
the inverse algorithm suggests that JAMA uses a less square algorithm for non-square matrix,
while the referencing module will need a different approach (to be committed later).

author: jsc
msg: prepare new snapshot = RC1 for AOO 4.0.1

author: gsim
msg: QPID-5130: map type to exchange-type when translating old x-declare clause into node properties
